name: Safe Haven
summary_text: A young woman with a mysterious past lands in Southport, North Carolina where her bond with a widower forces her to confront the dark secret that haunts her.

name: She's Out of My League
summary_text: An average Joe meets the perfect woman, but his lack of confidence and the influence of his friends and family begin to pick away at the relationship.

name: The Change-Up
summary_text: Dave is a married man with three kids and a loving wife, and Mitch is a single man who is at the prime of his sexual life. One fateful night while Mitch and Dave are peeing in a fountain, lightning strikes and they switch bodies.

name: Tehran
summary_text: A Mossad agent embarks on her first mission as a computer hacker in her home town of Tehran.

name: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
summary_text: Larry spans the globe, uniting favorite and new characters while embarking on an epic quest to save the magic before it is gone forever.

name: Rudy
summary_text: Rudy has always been told that he was too small to play college football. But he is determined to overcome the odds and fulfill his dream of playing for Notre Dame.

name: Queen of Spades
summary_text: According to legend, an ominous entity known as the Queen of Spades can be summoned by performing an ancient ritual.

name: Saw III
summary_text: Jigsaw abducts a doctor in order to keep himself alive while he watches his new apprentice put an unlucky citizen named Jeff through a brutal test.

name: Wild Child
summary_text: A rebellious Malibu princess is shipped off to a strict English boarding school by her father.

name: The Hunter
summary_text: Martin, a mercenary, is sent from Europe by a mysterious biotech company to the Tasmanian wilderness on a hunt for the last Tasmanian tiger.

name: The Hangover Part III
summary_text: When one of their own is kidnapped by an angry gangster, the Wolf Pack must track down Mr. Chow, who has escaped from prison and is on the run.

name: Bonnie and Clyde
summary_text: Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

name: Mission: Impossible III
summary_text: IMF agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fiancée in response.

name: Dirty Sexy Money
summary_text: A lawyer is forced to take care of one of New York City's wealthiest families.

name: Heavy Metal
summary_text: A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.

name: Bancroft
summary_text: A dark thriller surrounding Elizabeth Bancroft, a senior detective with explosive secrets.

name: Spinning Out
summary_text: A figure skating Olympic hopeful's struggle to balance love, family and fragile mental health as her dream of winning takes a dizzying hold.

name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
summary_text: After picking up a traumatized young hitchhiker, five friends find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chainsaw-wielding loon and his family of equally psychopathic killers.

name: My Roommate Is a Gumiho
summary_text: The thrilling love story of Shin Woo Yeo, a 999 years-old gumiho who wants to become human, and Lee Dam who accidentally swallowed his fox bead.

name: The Singapore Grip
summary_text: The son of a British family living in South East Asia becomes involved in a love triangle.

name: Young & Beautiful
summary_text: After losing her virginity, Isabelle takes up a secret life as a call girl, meeting her clients for hotel-room trysts. Throughout, she remains curiously aloof, showing little interest in the encounters themselves or the money she makes.

name: Sully
summary_text: The story of Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger (Tom Hanks), an American pilot who became a hero after landing his damaged plane on the Hudson River in order to save the flight's passengers and crew.

name: Sam & Cat
summary_text: A pair of roommates start a baby-sitting service to earn extra cash.

name: Shakespeare in Love
summary_text: The world's greatest ever playwright, William Shakespeare, is young, out of ideas and short of cash, but meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

name: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World Water Crisis
summary_text: A majority of the Scott Pilgrim cast reunite for a read through of the screenplay on behalf of Water for People.

name: Alien vs. Predator
summary_text: During an archaeological expedition on Bouvetøya Island in Antarctica, a team of archaeologists and other scientists find themselves caught up in a battle between the two legends. Soon, the team realize that only one species can win.

name: Trial by Fire
summary_text: The tragic and controversial story of Cameron Todd Willingham, who was executed in Texas for killing his three children after scientific evidence and expert testimony that bolstered his claims of innocence were suppressed.

name: Salt
summary_text: A CIA agent goes on the run after a defector accuses her of being a Russian spy.

name: The Equalizer 2
summary_text: Robert McCall serves an unflinching justice for the exploited and oppressed, but how far will he go when that is someone he loves?

name: Manhunter
summary_text: Former FBI profiler Will Graham returns to service to pursue a deranged serial killer dubbed "the Tooth Fairy" by the media.

name: Monster
summary_text: A brilliant neurosurgeon living in Germany finds his life in utter turmoil after getting involved with a psychopath that was once a former patient.

name: Rocky IV
summary_text: Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-four, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.

name: Dogtooth
summary_text: A controlling, manipulative father locks his three adult offspring in a state of perpetual childhood by keeping them prisoner within the sprawling family compound.

name: The Karate Kid Part III
summary_text: Ostracised villain John Kreese attempts to gain revenge on Daniel and Miyagi, with the help of a Vietnam War comrade, the wealthy owner of a toxic waste disposal business.

name: Major Payne
summary_text: A recently discharged Major finds himself commanding a group of mismatched Cadets.

name: Tribes of Europa
summary_text: 2074. In the wake of a mysterious global disaster, war rages between the Tribes that have emerged from the wreckage of Europe. Three siblings from the peaceful Origine tribe are separated and forced to forge their own paths.

name: Roman Empire
summary_text: Chronicles some of the most famous leaders of the Roman Civilization.

name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
summary_text: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.

name: Hell on Wheels
summary_text: The Civil War is past, but former Confederate soldier Cullen Bohannon can't put it behind him. Fresh are the memories of the death of his wife, killed at the hands of the Union soldiers, an act that sets him on a course of revenge.

name: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
summary_text: Sequel to the 2019 film 'Shazam!'. Plot details are not yet known.

name: Spontaneous
summary_text: Get ready for the outrageous coming-of-age love story about growing up...and blowing up. When students in their school begin exploding (literally), seniors Mara and Dylan struggle to survive in a world where each moment may be their last.

name: Ripper Street
summary_text: The streets of Whitechapel are the haunt of Detective Inspector Edmund Reid and his team of officers, who aim to maintain law and order in a place once terrorized by Jack the Ripper.

name: Luis Miguel: The Series
summary_text: The series dramatizes the life story of Mexican superstar singer Luis Miguel, who has captivated audiences in Latin America and beyond for decades.

name: Hvide Sande
summary_text: White Sands is a light crime series about an undercover expert and a homicide detective who are secretly sent to a Danish seaside town to solve the killing of a young German man while pretending to be a married couple.

name: Emergency!
summary_text: The crew of Los Angeles County Fire Department Station 51, particularly the paramedic team, and Rampart Hospital respond to emergencies in their operating area.

name: The Dark and the Wicked
summary_text: On a secluded farm in a nondescript rural town, a man is slowly dying. His family gathers to mourn, and soon a darkness grows, marked by waking nightmares and a growing sense that something evil is taking over the family.

name: Blood Father
summary_text: An ex-con reunites with his estranged wayward 17-year old daughter to protect her from drug dealers who are trying to kill her.

name: Ocean's Twelve
summary_text: Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Ocean's Eleven (2001).

name: The Last House on the Left
summary_text: After kidnapping and brutally assaulting two young women, a gang unknowingly finds refuge at a vacation home belonging to the parents of one of the victims: a mother and father who devise an increasingly gruesome series of revenge tactics.

name: The Wind
summary_text: A plains-woman faces the harshness and isolation of the untamed land in the Western frontier of the late 1800s.

name: Predator 2
summary_text: The Predator returns to Earth, this time to stake a claim on the war-torn streets of a dystopian Los Angeles.

name: Big Jake
summary_text: In 1909, when John Fain's gang kidnaps Jacob McCandles' grandson and holds him for ransom, Big Jake sets out to rescue the boy.

name: Wild at Heart
summary_text: Young lovers Sailor and Lula run from the variety of weirdos that Lula's mom has hired to kill Sailor.

name: Bound
summary_text: Tough ex-con Corky and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caesar.

name: Atlantic Crossing
summary_text: The story of Crown Princess Märtha, who fought for her country and her marriage during the tragic events of World War II.

name: F Is for Family
summary_text: Follow the Murphy family back to the 1970s, when kids roamed wild, beer flowed freely and nothing came between a man and his TV.

name: Formula 1: Drive to Survive
summary_text: Docuseries following the FIA Formula One World Championship across multiple seasons.

name: Rake
summary_text: Criminal lawyer Cleaver Greene defends the indefensible - from bigamists to cannibals and everything in between. He is champion of the lost cause, both in the court room and in the bedroom.

name: Duncanville
summary_text: Duncanville is centered around a spectacularly average 15-year-old boy, named Duncan with a rich fantasy life, and the people in his world. He's not exceptional, but he has a wild imagination in which he's never anything less than amazing.

name: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
summary_text: A father and son, both coroners, are pulled into a complex mystery while attempting to identify the body of a young woman, who was apparently harboring dark secrets.

name: The Borgias
summary_text: In the fifteenth century, Pope Alexander VI tries to control all power in Italy with the help of his several sons, through murder, intrigue, war, and marriage alliances.

name: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge on the Run
summary_text: After SpongeBob's beloved pet snail Gary is snail-napped, he and Patrick embark on an epic adventure to The Lost City of Atlantic City to bring Gary home.

name: Red Oaks
summary_text: A coming-of-age comedy set in the "go-go" 80s about a college student enjoying a last hurrah before summer comes to an end--and the future begins.

name: Central Park
summary_text: An animated musical series that tells the story of a how a family of caretakers, who live and work in Central Park, end up saving the park, and basically the world.

name: Annie
summary_text: A foster kid, who lives with her mean foster mom, sees her life change when business tycoon and New York City mayoral candidate Will Stacks makes a thinly-veiled campaign move and takes her in.

name: The Internship
summary_text: Two salesmen whose careers have been torpedoed by the digital age find their way into a coveted internship at Google, where they must compete with a group of young, tech-savvy geniuses for a shot at employment.

name: Mama's Family
summary_text: Mama's Family originated with Thelma "Mama" Harper, and her younger sister Fran living together in Mama's House.

name: Escape from Pretoria
summary_text: Based on the real-life prison break of two political captives, Escape From Pretoria is a race-against-time thriller set in the tumultuous apartheid days of South Africa.

name: Sublet
summary_text: A New York Times travel writer comes to Tel Aviv after suffering a tragedy. The energy of the city and his relationship with a younger man brings him back to life.

name: The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance
summary_text: Return to the world of Thra, where three Gelfling discover the horrifying secret behind the Skeksis' power, and set out to ignite the fires of rebellion and save their world.

name: A Different World
summary_text: A group of students at a historically Black university struggle to make it through college.

name: Adventures in Babysitting
summary_text: A babysitter must battle her way through the big city after being stranded there with the kids she's looking after.

name: A Million Ways to Die in the West
summary_text: As a cowardly farmer begins to fall for the mysterious new woman in town, he must put his newly found courage to the test when her husband, a notorious gun-slinger, announces his arrival.

name: A.P. Bio
summary_text: A former philosophy professor who takes a job teaching advanced placement biology uses his students to get back at the people in his life who have wronged him.

name: Rough Night
summary_text: Things go terribly wrong for a group of girlfriends who hire a male stripper for a bachelorette party in Miami.

name: A View to a Kill
summary_text: The recovery of a microchip off the body of a fellow agent leads James Bond to a mad industrialist who plans to create a worldwide microchip monopoly by destroying California's Silicon Valley.

name: Casper
summary_text: An afterlife therapist and his daughter meet a friendly young ghost when they move into a crumbling mansion in order to rid the premises of wicked spirits.

name: A Bigger Splash
summary_text: The vacation of a famous rock star and her boyfriend in Italy is disrupted by the unexpected visit of an old friend and his daughter.

name: #Alive
summary_text: The rapid spread of an unknown infection has left an entire city in ungovernable chaos, but one survivor remains alive in isolation. It is his story.

name: Project X
summary_text: 3 high school seniors throw a birthday party to make a name for themselves. As the night progresses, things spiral out of control as word of the party spreads.

name: Sleepy Hollow
summary_text: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people, with the culprit being the legendary apparition, The Headless Horseman.

name: Alien: Resurrection
summary_text: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone. Along with a crew of space pirates, she must again battle the deadly aliens and stop them from reaching Earth.

name: Crooked House
summary_text: In Agatha Christie's most twisted tale, a spy-turned-private-detective is lured by his former lover to catch her grandfather's murderer before Scotland Yard exposes dark family secrets.

name: Hannah Montana
summary_text: Adventures of a teenage pop star who keeps her identity secret from even her closest friends by using a disguise on-stage.

name: Matlock
summary_text: Ben Matlock is a very expensive criminal defense attorney, who charges one hundred thousand dollars to take a case. Fortunately, he's worth every penny, as he and his associates defend his clients by finding the real killer.

name: August: Osage County
summary_text: A look at the lives of the strong-willed women of the Weston family, whose paths have diverged until a family crisis brings them back to the Oklahoma house they grew up in, and to the dysfunctional woman who raised them.

name: Possession
summary_text: A woman starts exhibiting increasingly disturbing behavior after asking her husband for a divorce. Suspicions of infidelity soon give way to something much more sinister.

name: Enter the Void
summary_text: An American drug dealer living in Tokyo is betrayed by his best friend and killed in a drug deal. His soul, observing the repercussions of his death, seeks resurrection.

name: Never Let Me Go
summary_text: The lives of three friends, from their early school days into young adulthood, when the reality of the world they live in comes knocking.

name: Braindead
summary_text: A young man's mother is bitten by a Sumatran rat-monkey. She gets sick and dies, at which time she comes back to life, killing and eating dogs, nurses, friends, and neighbors.

name: Akira
summary_text: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.

name: Fast & Furious 10
summary_text: Plot unknown. The tenth and final film of the 'Fast and Furious' franchise.

name: Cold Mountain
summary_text: In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina to reunite with his sweetheart.

name: Robots
summary_text: In a robot world, a young idealistic inventor travels to the big city to join his inspiration's company, only to find himself opposing its sinister new management.

name: Going in Style
summary_text: Desperate to pay the bills and come through for their loved ones, three lifelong pals risk it all by embarking on a daring bid to knock off the very bank that absconded with their money.

name: London Fields
summary_text: Clairvoyant femme fatale Nicola Six has been living with a dark premonition of her impending death by murder. She begins a tangled love affair with three uniquely different men: one of whom she knows will be her murderer.

name: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
summary_text: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

name: Saw IV
summary_text: Despite Jigsaw's death, and in order to save the lives of two of his colleagues, Lieutenant Rigg is forced to take part in a new game, which promises to test him to the limit.

name: 47 Meters Down
summary_text: Two sisters vacationing in Mexico are trapped in a shark cage at the bottom of the ocean. With less than an hour of oxygen left and great white sharks circling nearby, they must fight to survive.

name: Dracula
summary_text: In 1897 Transylvania, the blood-drinking Count draws his plans against Victorian London.

name: Inferno
summary_text: When Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia, he teams up with Dr. Sienna Brooks, and together they must race across Europe against the clock to foil a deadly global plot.

name: Professionals
summary_text: After their advanced medical satellite explodes on deployment, billionaire futurist Peter Swann, and his fiancée, medical visionary Dr. Graciela "Grace" Davila, turn to a hardened former counterintelligence officer.

name: Hostel: Part II
summary_text: Three American college students studying abroad are lured to a Slovakian hostel, and discover the grim reality behind it.

name: Allegiant
summary_text: After the earth-shattering revelations of Insurgent, Tris must escape with Four beyond the wall that encircles Chicago, to finally discover the shocking truth of the world around them.

name: McLintock!
summary_text: Wealthy rancher G.W. McLintock uses his power and influence in the territory to keep the peace between farmers, ranchers, land-grabbers, Indians and corrupt government officials.

name: Criminal: UK
summary_text: A cat-and-mouse drama, which focuses on the intense mental conflict between detectives and suspects. The stories take place within the confines of a police interview suite.

name: Spy Kids
summary_text: Using high tech gadgets, two kids have to save their reactivated OSS top spy parents when they're taken by an evil, high tech enemy.

name: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
summary_text: Edward leaves Bella after an attack that nearly claimed her life, and, in her depression, she falls into yet another difficult relationship - this time with her close friend, Jacob Black.

name: Playtime
summary_text: Monsieur Hulot curiously wanders around a high-tech Paris, paralleling a trip with a group of American tourists. Meanwhile, a nightclub/restaurant prepares its opening night, but it's still under construction.

name: The Nightingale
summary_text: Set in 1825, Clare, a young Irish convict woman, chases a British officer through the rugged Tasmanian wilderness, bent on revenge for a terrible act of violence he committed against her family. On the way she enlists the services of an Aboriginal tracker named Billy, who is also marked by trauma from his own violence-filled past.

name: The Librarians
summary_text: A group of librarians sets off on adventures in an effort to save mysterious, ancient artifacts.

name: Adam-12
summary_text: Two regular police officers patrol Los Angeles.

name: We Are Who We Are
summary_text: Two American teenagers come of age while living on an American military base in Italy.

name: Hot Girls Wanted
summary_text: A documentary about young women who have been drawn into the sex trade - and how easy it is for a web-savvy generation to end up making porn.

name: Archive
summary_text: 2038: George Almore is working on a true human-equivalent AI. His latest prototype is almost ready. This sensitive phase is also the riskiest. Especially as he has a goal that must be hidden at all costs.

name: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
summary_text: The Angels investigate a series of murders which occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database.

name: Rugrats
summary_text: The cartoon misadventures of four babies and their snotty older cousin as they face the things in life they don't understand.

name: Mid90s
summary_text: Follows Stevie, a thirteen-year-old in 1990s-era Los Angeles who spends his summer navigating between his troubled home life and a group of new friends that he meets at a Motor Avenue skate shop.

name: America: The Motion Picture
summary_text: A chainsaw-wielding George Washington teams with beer-loving bro Sam Adams to take down the Brits in a tongue-in-cheek riff on the American Revolution.

name: The Bridge
summary_text: Two detectives work together to take down a serial killer operating on both sides of the Texas-Chihuahua border.

name: Being John Malkovich
summary_text: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

name: Come True
summary_text: A teenage runaway takes part in a sleep study that becomes a nightmarish descent into the depths of her mind and a frightening examination of the power of dreams.

name: Teen Wolf
summary_text: An ordinary high school student discovers that his family has an unusual pedigree when he finds himself turning into a werewolf.

name: The Way Back
summary_text: Jack Cunningham was a high school basketball phenom who walked away from the game, forfeiting his future. Years later, when he reluctantly accepts a coaching job at his alma mater, he may get one last shot at redemption.

name: The Man with the Answers
summary_text: A former Greek diving champion and an eccentric German student take an adventurous road-trip of rediscovery from Bari to Bavaria.

name: Darkness: Those Who Kill
summary_text: Investigator Jan and profiler Louise constantly move around in the thrilling periphery of a murderer's view as they link a series of killings.

name: The Last Picture Show
summary_text: In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.

name: Flightplan
summary_text: A bereaved woman and her daughter are flying home from Berlin to America. At 30,000 feet, the child vanishes, and nobody will admit she was ever on the plane.

name: 127 Hours
summary_text: A mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.
A man who specialises in debunking paranormal occurrences checks into the fabled room 1408 in the Dolphin Hotel. Soon after settling in, he confronts genuine terror.

name: Seven Psychopaths
summary_text: A struggling screenwriter inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends kidnap a gangster's beloved Shih Tzu.

name: 9½ Weeks
summary_text: A woman becomes involved with a man she barely knows. Complications develop during their sexual escapades.

name: Seungriho
summary_text: Set in the year 2092 and follows the crew of a space junk collector ship called The Victory. When they discover a humanoid robot named Dorothy that's known to be a weapon of mass destruction, they get involved in a risky business deal.

name: Big Love
summary_text: A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives.

name: Parker
summary_text: A thief with a unique code of professional ethics is double-crossed by his crew and left for dead. Assuming a new disguise and forming an unlikely alliance with a woman on the inside, he looks to hijack the score of the crew's latest heist.

name: Artemis Fowl
summary_text: Artemis Fowl, a young criminal prodigy, hunts down a secret society of fairies to find his missing father.

name: The Great British Baking Show
summary_text: Bakers attempt three challenges each week trying to impress the judges enough to go through to the next round and eventually are crowned Britain's best amateur baker.

name: Field of Dreams
summary_text: Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella is inspired by a voice he can't ignore to pursue a dream he can hardly believe. Supported by his wife, Ray begins the quest by turning his ordinary cornfield into a place where dreams can come true.

name: Big
summary_text: After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.

name: Jacob's Ladder
summary_text: Mourning his dead child, a haunted Vietnam War veteran attempts to uncover his past while suffering from a severe case of dissociation. To do so, he must decipher reality and life from his own dreams, delusions, and perceptions of death.

name: The Piano
summary_text: In the mid-19th century, a mute woman is sent to New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner, but is soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.

name: Wild Tales
summary_text: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

name: Messiah
summary_text: When a CIA officer investigates a man, and his followers, attracting international attention through acts of public disruption, she embarks on a global high-stakes mission to uncover whether he is a divine entity, or a deceptive con artist.

name: Death in Texas
summary_text: Just out of prison, Billy Walker returns to El Paso to find his mom dying of liver failure but low on the transplant list. However, the border offers other, darker options.

name: Blithe Spirit
summary_text: A man and his second wife are haunted by the ghost of his first wife.

name: Verónica
summary_text: Madrid, 1991. A teen girl finds herself besieged by an evil supernatural force after she played Ouija with two classmates.

name: Lost in Space
summary_text: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

name: Popeye
summary_text: The adventures of the famous sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.

name: Tomorrow Never Dies
summary_text: James Bond sets out to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

name: Shrek the Third
summary_text: Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming.

name: Everwood
summary_text: A widowed brain surgeon from Manhattan moves his two children to the small mountain town of Everwood, Colorado.

name: Legion
summary_text: When a group of strangers at a dusty roadside diner come under attack by demonic forces, their only chance for survival lies with an archangel named Michael, who informs a pregnant waitress that her unborn child is humanity's last hope.

name: Superman Returns
summary_text: Superman returns to Earth after spending five years in space examining his homeworld Krypton. But he finds things have changed while he was gone, and he must once again prove himself important to the world.

name: Planet Terror
summary_text: After an experimental bio-weapon is released, turning thousands into zombie-like creatures, it's up to a rag-tag group of survivors to stop the infected and those behind its release.

name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them 3
summary_text: The third installment of the 'Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them' series which follows the adventures of Newt Scamander.

name: And Just Like That...
summary_text: The series will follow Carrie, Miranda and Charlotte as they navigate the journey from the complicated reality of life and friendship in their 30s to the even more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.

name: The Amazing World of Gumball
summary_text: The life of a twelve-year-old boy who happens to be a blue cat as he lives with his family and other strange creatures.

name: T2 Trainspotting
summary_text: After 20 years abroad, Mark Renton returns to Scotland and reunites with his old friends Sick Boy, Spud, and Begbie.

name: The Losers
summary_text: A CIA special forces team are betrayed and left for dead by their superiors, galvanizing them to mount an offensive on the CIA.

name: Swallow
summary_text: Hunter, a newly pregnant housewife, finds herself increasingly compelled to consume dangerous objects. As her husband and his family tighten their control over her life, she must confront the dark secret behind her new obsession.

name: House of 1000 Corpses
summary_text: Two young couples traveling across the backwoods of Texas searching for urban legends of murder end up as prisoners of a bizarre and sadistic backwater family of serial killers.

name: The Time Machine
summary_text: A man's vision for a utopian society is disillusioned when travelling forward into time reveals a dark and dangerous society.

name: 2gether: The Movie
summary_text: The movie is was gonna a "Complete Edition" by combining 2gether The series and Still 2gether. In this version, we will get to be see more of Sarawat's point of view on some scenes, such as...                See full summary »

name: Sliders
summary_text: A boy genius and his comrades travel to different parallel universes, trying to find their way back home.

name: Bastille Day
summary_text: A young pickpocket and an unruly CIA agent team up on an anti-terrorist mission in France.

name: Girl Meets World
summary_text: More than a decade after Boy Meets World (1993), Cory and Topanga Matthews are married and have two children. Their daughter, Riley, faces life lessons through her family, friends, and school--where her father is her history teacher--as her parents did when they were younger.

name: Josie and the Pussycats
summary_text: A girl group find themselves in the middle of a conspiracy to deliver subliminal messages through popular music.

name: Endless Love
summary_text: The story of a privileged girl and a charismatic boy whose instant desire sparks a love affair made only more reckless by parents trying to keep them apart.

name: The Post
summary_text: A cover-up spanning four U.S. Presidents pushes the country's first female newspaper publisher and her editor to join an unprecedented battle between press and government.

name: Crime in the Streets
summary_text: Social worker tries to befriend local slum gang.

name: First Man
summary_text: A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969.

name: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
summary_text: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

name: Hollow Man
summary_text: When the leader of a team of scientists volunteers to be the test subject for their experiment in human invisibility, he slowly unravels and turns against them, with horrific consequences.

name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1
summary_text: The Quileutes close in on expecting parents Edward and Bella, whose unborn child poses a threat to the Wolf Pack and the towns people of Forks.

name: Panchayat
summary_text: A comedy-drama, which captures the journey of an engineering graduate Abhishek, who for lack of a better job option joins as secretary of a Panchayat office in a remote village of Uttar Pradesh.

name: Catastrophe
summary_text: American man Rob gets Irish woman Sharon pregnant when they hook up for a week while he is on a business trip in London.

name: Monster's Ball
summary_text: After a family tragedy, a racist prison guard re-examines his attitudes while falling in love with the African-American wife of the last prisoner he executed.

name: The Longest Day
summary_text: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.

name: Mirage
summary_text: Two storms separated by 25 years. A woman murdered. A daughter missed. Only 72 hours to discover the truth.

name: Casualty
summary_text: The everyday lives of the people frequenting the frenetic Accident and Emergency department of Holby City Hospital.

name: Hugo
summary_text: In 1931 Paris, an orphan living in the walls of a train station gets wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

name: I Origins
summary_text: A molecular biologist and his laboratory partner uncover evidence that may fundamentally change society as we know it.

name: Paradise
summary_text: After their caravan is attacked and their respective families butchered by Arab marauders, teenagers David and Sarah flee across the desert. But the desert is filled with danger from the elements, animals and the appetite of the Jackal.

name: The Strangers
summary_text: A young couple staying in an isolated vacation home are terrorized by three unknown assailants.

name: Insidious: Chapter 3
summary_text: A prequel set before the haunting of the Lambert family that reveals how gifted psychic Elise Rainier reluctantly agrees to use her ability to contact the dead in order to help a teenage girl who has been targeted by a dangerous supernatural entity.

name: Cold Pursuit
summary_text: A grieving snowplow driver seeks out revenge against the drug dealers who killed his son.

name: Borgen
summary_text: A political drama about a prime minister's rise to power, and how power changes a prime minister.

name: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
summary_text: Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.

name: Flatbush Misdemeanors
summary_text: A raw comedy of city life following Dan and Kevin, who play characters struggling to thrive in their new surroundings in Flatbush, Brooklyn.

name: Population 436
summary_text: A census-taker (Sisto) is sent to investigate why a certain small town has had the same population -- 436 residents -- for the last 100 years.

name: Torchwood
summary_text: The members of the Torchwood Institute, a secret organization founded by the British Crown, fight to protect the Earth from extraterrestrial and supernatural threats.

name: Shakespeare & Hathaway: Private Investigators
summary_text: An oddball couple of private detectives named Luella Shakespeare and Frank Hathaway investigate crime in Stratford-upon-Avon.

name: Ordinary People
summary_text: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father, and the guilt-ridden younger son.

name: The Bourne Legacy
summary_text: An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films.

name: The One
summary_text: Love -- and lies -- spiral when a DNA researcher helps discover a way to find the perfect partner, and creates a bold new matchmaking service.

name: Disaster Movie
summary_text: Over the course of one evening, an unsuspecting group of twenty-somethings find themselves bombarded by a series of natural disasters and catastrophic events.

name: Taking Lives
summary_text: An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim.

name: The Wedding Guest
summary_text: A story centered on a mysterious British Muslim man (Dev Patel) on his journey across Pakistan and India.

name: Humanoids from the Deep
summary_text: Humanoid sea creatures start killing a fishing town's residents, and raping their women. It's up to the townsfolk and a visiting biologist to fight back and fend them off.

name: Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues
summary_text: With the 1970s behind them, San Diego's top-rated newsman, Ron Burgundy, returns to take New York City's first twenty-four-hour news channel by storm.

name: Reacher
summary_text: TV series based on Lee Child's 'Jack Reacher' novels.

name: Die Hard 2
summary_text: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

name: The Commuter
summary_text: An action-thriller in which an insurance salesman/ex-cop is caught up in a life-threatening conspiracy during his daily commute home.

name: The Upshaws
summary_text: It centers on a working-class African American family in Indiana struggling to make it work and make it right without any blueprints.

name: Lord of the Flies
summary_text: Schoolboys marooned on a Pacific island create their own savage civilization.

name: Machete
summary_text: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.

name: Death Wish
summary_text: A New York City architect becomes a one-man vigilante squad after his wife is murdered by street punks. In self-defense, the vengeful man kills muggers on the mean streets after dark.

name: Dark Matter
summary_text: In the dystopian 27th century, six people wake up on a deserted spaceship with no memory of who they are or what they're doing there. They reluctantly team up and set off to find answers with the help of a female android.

name: Departure
summary_text: A high-octane conspiracy series that follows the mystery of Flight 716 - a passenger plane that vanishes over the Atlantic Ocean.

name: The Facts of Life
summary_text: Mrs. Edna Garrett, the Drummonds' former housekeeper, teaches a group of girls at a boarding school how to tackle issues throughout teenage life and later adulthood.

name: S.W.A.T.
summary_text: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody, and only the L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

name: Lucky Number Slevin
summary_text: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses. Under constant surveillance by Detective Brikowski and assassin Goodkat, he must get them before they get him.

name: Grandma's Boy
summary_text: A thirty-five-year-old video game tester has to move in with his grandma and her two old lady roommates.

name: RuPaul's Drag Race Down Under
summary_text: RuPaul's Drag Race spin-off series featuring drag queens from Australia and New Zealand competing to become Down Under's Drag Superstar.

name: Sailor Moon Eternal
summary_text: When a dark power enshrouds the Earth after a total solar eclipse, the scattered Sailor Guardians must reunite to bring light back into the world.

name: A Cinderella Story
summary_text: Routinely exploited by her wicked stepmother, the downtrodden Samantha Montgomery is excited about the prospect of meeting her Internet beau at the school's Halloween dance.

name: Joe Dirt
summary_text: After being abandoned by his parents at the Grand Canyon, Joe Dirt tells the story of his journey to find his parents.

name: Public Enemies
summary_text: The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

name: Avenue 5
summary_text: The troubled crew of Avenue 5, a space cruise ship filled with spoiled, rich, snotty space tourists, must try and keep everyone calm after their ship gets thrown off course into space and ends up needing three years to return to Earth.

name: Of Mice and Men
summary_text: A nomadic farm worker looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend during the Great Depression.

name: To the Bone
summary_text: A young woman, dealing with anorexia, meets an unconventional doctor who challenges her to face her condition and embrace life.

name: Children of the Corn
summary_text: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believes that everyone over age 18 must be killed.

name: Persuasion
summary_text: Based on the novel by Jane Austen

name: Lords of Dogtown
summary_text: The film follows the surf and skateboarding trends that originated in Venice, California during the 1970's.

name: Species
summary_text: A group of scientists try to track down and trap a killer alien seductress before she successfully mates with a human.

name: The Sons of Sam: A Descent into Darkness
summary_text: The Son of Sam case grew into a lifelong obsession for journalist Maury Terry, who became convinced that the murders were linked to a satanic cult.

name: Child's Play
summary_text: A single mother gives her son a much sought-after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.

name: Timewasters
summary_text: A struggling jazz band from South London are propelled back in time.

name: All the President's Men
summary_text: "The Washington Post" reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Richard Nixon's resignation.

name: The Bite
summary_text: Created and written by Robert and Michelle King, The Second Wave follows an unexpected, deadly second wave of the coronavirus outbreak in New York City. It follows the lives of two ...                See full summary »

name: Rat Race
summary_text: A Las Vegas casino magnate, determined to find a new avenue for wagering, sets up a race for money.

name: The Foreigner
summary_text: A humble businessman with a buried past seeks justice when his daughter is killed in an act of terrorism. A cat-and-mouse conflict ensues with a government official, whose past may hold clues to the killers' identities.

name: 21 Bridges
summary_text: An embattled NYPD detective is thrust into a citywide manhunt for a pair of cop killers after uncovering a massive and unexpected conspiracy.

name: Two Guys, a Girl and a Pizza Place
summary_text: Three twenty-somethings share a Boston apartment and hang around (and work) at a pizza place.

name: Suspiria
summary_text: An American newcomer to a prestigious German ballet academy comes to realize that the school is a front for something sinister amid a series of grisly murders.

name: Kota Factory
summary_text: Dedicated to Shrimati SL Loney ji, Shri Irodov ji and Maanniya HC Verma ji, 'Kota Factory' is TVF's latest original. India's first 'Black and White' show highlights the problems present day IIT-JEE aspirants face in their day-to-day lives.

name: The Fisher King
summary_text: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

name: Twist
summary_text: A Modern take on the classic tale of Oliver Twist.

name: Silent House
summary_text: A girl is trapped inside her family's lakeside retreat and becomes unable to contact the outside world as supernatural forces haunt the house with mysterious energy and consequences.

name: The Perfect Storm
summary_text: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

name: Deadly Class
summary_text: A coming-of-age story set against the backdrop of late 1980s counterculture, which follows a disillusioned teen recruited into a storied high school for assassins.

name: Zoey 101
summary_text: Zoey Brooks and her brother, Dustin, attend their first day at Pacific Coast Academy, a private boarding school that enrolls girls for the first time in its history.

name: White Girl
summary_text: Summer, New York City. A college girl falls hard for a guy she just met. After a night of partying goes wrong, she goes to wild extremes to get him back.

name: Little Women
summary_text: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.

name: The Defenders
summary_text: Set a few months after the events of the second season of Daredevil, and a month after the events of Iron Fist, the vigilantes Daredevil, Jessica Jones, Luke Cage, and Iron Fist team up in New York City to fight a common enemy: The Hand.

name: Just Shoot Me!
summary_text: Hot-tempered journalist Maya got herself fired yet again. Unable to find a job anywhere else and facing eviction, she is forced to go work for Blush, her father's fashion magazine.

name: Killing Them Softly
summary_text: Jackie Cogan is an enforcer hired to restore order after three dumb guys rob a Mob protected card game, causing the local criminal economy to collapse.

name: Head of the Class
summary_text: A laidback teacher provides needed guidance about life for a special class of exceptional students.

name: The Practice
summary_text: We follow the exploits and cases of defense attorneys of a Boston law firm. Bobby Donnell is the senior defense attorney and founder of the firm.

name: The Crying Game
summary_text: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.
